titles.title: To provide for the applicability of Federal minority set-aside requirements to Hispanic Americans of Spanish or Portuguese origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

bill.summary: 9/12/1994--Introduced. States that U.S. citizens whose origins are in Spain or Portugal shall be considered Hispanic Americans for purposes of any Federal requirements giving Hispanic Americans a preference in the award of a procurement contract or subcontract.
